LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.label: Toxicated
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.description: Toxic synthetic compounds within the bloodstream, causing severe health defects.
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.stages.0.label: Insignificant
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.stages.1.label: Minor
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.stages.2.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.stages.3.label: Major
LanguageData.ATR_Toxicated.stages.4.label: Systemic
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.label: Mechanite antifreeze
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.description: Synthetic chemical compound designed to reduce chassis susceptibility to adverse temperature - positive and negative. Not safe for organic consumption.
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.stages.0.label: Insignificant
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.stages.1.label: Minor
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.stages.2.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.stages.3.label: Significant
LanguageData.ATR_MechAntifreeze.stages.4.label: Peak
